title: Meta AI
content: Meta AI We’re unlocking the possibilities of AI, together. Through research and community collaboration, we’re advancing the state-of-the-art in Generative AI, Computer Vision, NLP, Infrastructure and other areas of AI. We’re also applying our learnings to innovative, safe products, tools and experiences across our family of apps. Whether it be research, product or infrastructure development, we’re driven to innovate responsibly with AI to benefit the world. Our people are committed to doing so at every step of the process with Meta’s core values in mind: openness, collaboration, excellence, and scale. Featured research Developed by FAIR, SAM (Segment Anything Model) is a promptable AI model that can “cut out” any object, in any image, with a single click. We believe the responsible advancement of AI should be a shared community initiative. AI Research Together, we’re responsibly advancing the state-of-the-art in AI through fundamental and applied research. Our goal is apply our learnings to create products and experiences that benefit all people. AI Resources From research exploration to large-scale production deployments, we share our frameworks, libraries, demos, system cards, models, tools, such as PyTorch, ONNX, Glow and more. Subscribe to our newsletter to keep up with Meta AI news, events, research breakthroughs, and more. Subscribe to our newsletter to keep up with Meta AI news, events, research breakthroughs, and more.
